full_summary:
# W7701-237714: Acquisition of Calibration Targets for Hyperspectral Thermal Imaging
## Background

 Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) is seeking the acquisition of calibration targets for hyperspectral thermal imaging. The acquisition will support the Defense Research and Development Canada’s (DRDC) defense research and development activities at Valcartier, in Quebec.

## RFP Details

### Solicitation and Tender Information

| Title         | Description                                                                                                                                                      |
|---------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Solicitation  | WS3769908969                                                                                                                                                   |
| Tender Number | W7701-237714                                                                                                                                                  |
| Announcement  | Request for Proposal (RFP)                                                                                                                                        |
| Method        | Competitive, Open bidding                                                                                                                                        |
| Category      | Goods and Services                                                                                                                                                |

### Tender Status and Dates

| Date        | Description                                              |
|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|
| Publication  | 2023-03-22                                                |
| Closing     | 2023-05-24, 14:00 EST                                      |
| Expected Contract Start Date  | N/A                                                     |
| Expected Contract End Date  | 2023-06-30                                               |

### Technical Requirements and Deliverables

* The acquisition includes the delivery of calibration targets for hyperspectral thermal imaging to Valcartier, Quebec.
* All bids must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on May 24, 2023, at the latest.
* Late bids will not be considered.

### Contracting Entity and End-User Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
* End-User Entity: Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) / Department of National Defence (DND)

### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity

* The tender is open to NAFTA, CPTPP, WTO GPA and Canada-UK TCA signatory countries.
* Deliveries will be made in the province of Quebec, excluding National Capital Region.

### Contact Information

* If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact Lisa-Marie Julien at lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
